title: New from TIPO: Chaco by Rubén Fontana
content:
We’re happy to announce a new typeface: Chaco.  
It comes in the OpenType format and consists of five weights.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019201547im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tipo_Chaco_release2009_4159.gif)
  
For an overview of the Chaco family, go to [http://www.tipo.net.ar/chaco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019201547/http:/www.tipo.net.ar/chaco "http://www.tipo.net.ar/chaco")
author: fontime
